PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: All polymers exhibited deep highest occupied molecular orbital energy levels and subsequently lead to high open circuit voltages of fabricated solar cell devices.

Let's think step by step.

1. All polymers: This is a mass noun or a group noun, representing a collection of polymers. It is not a property name.
2. Deep: This is an adjective describing the degree of the property, but it does not identify a specific property name.
3. highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy levels: This is a property name referring to the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital in each polymer.
4. and subsequently: This is a subordinating conjunction indicating cause and effect.
5. lead to: This is a verb indicating the result or effect.
6. high open circuit voltages: This is a property name referring to the voltage when no current is flowing in a solar cell.
7. of fabricated solar cell devices: This is a prepositional phrase indicating the solar cell devices are the subject of having high open circuit voltages.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy levels: This is a material property name referring to the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital in the polymers.
2. high open circuit voltages: This is a material property name referring to the voltage when no current is flowing in the solar cell devices.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy levels |
| high open circuit voltages |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: All polymers exhibited deep highest occupied molecular orbital energy levels and subsequently lead to high open circuit voltages of fabricated solar cell devices.

Let's think step by step.

1. All polymers: This is a mass noun or a group term, representing a collection of polymers. It does not directly refer to a specific property value.
2. Deep: This is an adjective describing the nature of the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy levels of the polymers. It does not have a specific numerical value.
3. highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy levels: This is a compound property, consisting of the molecular orbital and its energy level.
4. and subsequently: This is a conjunction connecting two ideas, not a property value.
5. lead to: This is a verb phrase indicating a cause-and-effect relationship.
6. high: This is an adjective describing the open circuit voltages of the fabricated solar cell devices. It does not have a specific numerical value.
7. open circuit voltages: This is a compound property, consisting of the open circuit voltage and its value.

Therefore, the property values in the paragraph are the deep HOMO energy levels and the high open circuit voltages, with no specific numerical values provided.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Deep HOMO energy levels (property value of polymers)
High open circuit voltages (property value of fabricated solar cell devices)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Deep HOMO energy levels of polymers |
| High open circuit voltages of fabricated solar cell devices |
